title: Update existing tests to use new Merge() signature
description:
Update all existing test files that call Merge() to use the new signature.

Files to modify:
- internal/worktree/merge_test.go - 6 call sites
- internal/worktree/conflict_test.go - 1 call site

Implementation:
Change all instances of:
  mm.Merge(wt)
to:
  mm.Merge(wt, MergeOptions{})

These tests should continue to pass as-is because they were testing merge to main, and the worktrees were created from main (so ParentBranch will be main).
acceptance_criteria: go test ./internal/worktree/... passes (all existing tests still work)
closed_reason: Test files already updated by 2su agent - all worktree tests pass
